Hero.Heading: Al-Mahdy
Hero.P: Al-Mahdi Industrial Safety Services Company is a leading provider of comprehensive safety solutions for industrial businesses. We specialize in delivering high-quality safety equipment, fire protection systems, workplace hazard assessments, and training programs designed to ensure the safety and well-being of workers in various industrial sectors. With a commitment to reliability and innovation.

About.Heading: Al-Mahdy
About.P: Al Assema Company is one of the leading companies specializing in compressed air technology, integrated engineering and industrial solutions, and production line equipment.

Ul.0: Maintenance and overhauls for all types of screw compressors, along with comprehensive maintenance contracts.
Ul.1: Supply of spare parts for all air compressors available in the Egyptian market.
Ul.2: Authorized distributors for SOTRAS and mann-filter, providing all types of filters and separator components for equipment.
Ul.3: Distinguished team of engineers and technicians who have received top-level training and have extensive experience working with major brands.
Ul.4: We offer imported screw air compressors for all applications.

cardPs.0: We work at a high level of quality to suit the client's requirements.
cardPs.1: We are the best in the market to offer competitive prices by understanding customer budget & their expectations, without compromising the quality standard.
cardPs.2: A Special team of professional engineers and technicians Highly experienced with full support with the latest tools and equipments.
cardPs.3: We ensure that projects are delivered within the specified timeframe for customers. We're ready to work 24/7 even in the narrowest timeframe. We have shown this in our previous projects.
cardPs.4: The company is committed to comprehensively guaranteeing all its services and missions with a quick response to customer requests.
cardPs.5: Al-Mahdy Company offers the manufacturing of uniforms and C-ZAR brand protective helmets, customized according to the client's specifications.

MainHeading.P: Al-Mahdy Company offers the manufacturing of uniforms and C-ZAR brand protective helmets, customized according to the client's specifications.

Our products guarantee customers achieve sustainable productivity in a wide range of markets, including general engineering, manufacturing and process industries, construction, automotive, pharmaceutical, food and much more.

ProductsCards.3: New air dryers, Chicago brand, from the Atlas Copco group
ProductsCards.5: Line filters of all sizes, Italian and Chinese
ProductsCards.7: Air filters, Noitech and Mann filter
ProductsCards.8: Oil filters, Noitech and Mann filter
